title.en: Celebrating 200th edition of Y Wawr – MyW's magazine at the Conrah Hotel.
title.cy: Dathlu rhifyn 200 o gylchgrawn Y Wawr yng ngwesty'r Conrah.

description.en: Past Editors and present  of  Y Wawr, left to right: Sian Lewis; Mair Edwards; Elin Angharad; Rhiannon Parry; Catrin Stevens; Janet Evans; Elin ap Howell (representing her mother, the late Rebecca Powell); Wendy Lloyd Jones.
description.cy: Cyn-Olygyddion a Golygydd newydd Y Wawr, o'r chwith i'r dde:  Sian Lewis; Mair Edwards; Elin Angharad; Rhiannon Parry; Catrin Stevens; Janet Evans; Elin ap Howell (yn cynrychioli ei mam, y diweddar Rebecca Powell); Wendy Lloyd Jones.
